name: Midnight Stroll (Cosmicallity)
description:
Do you like funny little animal people? Do you like doing completely normal things? Do you like the night? Then you'll (maybe) love Midnight Stroll! A game where you go around doing mostly normal things as a funny little animal person... at night!

Meet a bunch of weird people (most people are weird normally) and explore normal places (most normal places are pretty weird if you think about it) as you take a relaxing midnight stroll (only because there was a power outage). There's also, like, minigames and stuff. 

I hope you like squiggly monochrome!

(Bug reports and feedback are appreciated!)
